ExportJournalHtml.name: Export Journal to HTML
ExportJournalHtml.description: Export FoundryVTT Journal entries to HTML for saving locally or print to PDF
ExportJournalHtml.opt_remove_background_: Removes all standard background images to show a white background. If some still show, use the Custom CSS option to add any extra rules needed for your setup.
ExportJournalHtml.opt_custom_css_hint: Add your own override styles to the Journal on export.
